title: How to Turn Your Chatbot Into a Life Coach
description: A chatbot can be an effective motivator that helps you set goals and organize your schedule to achieve them.

title: The Super Connector Who Built Sam Bankman-Fried’s Celebrity World
description: Michael Kives, a former Hollywood agent, connected FTX’s founder to Katy Perry, Orlando Bloom, Bill Clinton and others. His firm got $700 million in exchange, a lawsuit claims.

title: The Super Connector Who Built Sam Bankman-Fried’s Celebrity World
description: Michael Kives, a former Hollywood agent, connected FTX’s founder to Katy Perry, Orlando Bloom, Bill Clinton and others. His firm got $700 million in exchange, a lawsuit claims.

title: A.I. Beach + Vibes-Based R.T.O. + the ‘Black Mirror’ Quamputer
description: Generative artificial intelligence can increasingly do the work of creatives — so why aren’t we seeing more A.I. ads and A.I. actors?

title: Reddit Wants to Grow Up. Will Its Community Let It?
description: As the social media site matures, its users and moderators have made their displeasure about corporate changes known, putting the company into a bind.

title: New Study Bolsters Room-Temperature Superconductor Claim
description: A team of researchers verified a key measurement from a study earlier this year that had faced doubts from other scientists.
